content.question: According to the article, how did one family in Beijing deal with a problem they encountered?

choices.label: They moved to a smaller city.
They made greater use of bicycles and mass transit.
They avoided taking their children on long trips.
They played mahjong (majiang) in the middle of a traffic jam.

content.answer: They played mahjong (majiang) in the middle of a traffic jam.
